properties.name: PlainText
properties.description: Gets or sets the plain text content of the editor.

properties.name: RtfContent
properties.description: Gets or sets the Rich Text Format (RTF) content.

properties.name: IsModified
properties.description: Gets or sets whether the content has been modified.

properties.name: FontName
properties.description: Gets or sets the current font name.

properties.name: FontSize
properties.description: Gets or sets the current font size in points.

properties.name: SelectionStart
properties.description: Gets or sets the selection start position.

properties.name: SelectionLength
properties.description: Gets or sets the selection length.

properties.name: TextLength
properties.description: Gets the total length of the text.

methods.name: Clear
methods.description: Clears all content from the editor.

methods.name: LoadFromFile
methods.description: Loads content from a file (supports RTF and TXT).

methods.name: SaveToFile
methods.description: Saves content to a file (RTF or TXT based on extension).

methods.name: AppendText
methods.description: Appends text at the end of the document.

methods.name: InsertText
methods.description: Inserts text at the current cursor position.

methods.name: SetBold
methods.description: Applies bold formatting to selected text.

methods.name: SetItalic
methods.description: Applies italic formatting to selected text.

methods.name: SetUnderline
methods.description: Applies underline formatting to selected text.

methods.name: SetStrikethrough
methods.description: Applies strikethrough formatting to selected text.

methods.name: SetFontColor
methods.description: Sets the font color for selected text.

parameters.name: hexColor
parameters.description: Color in hex format (e.g., "#FF0000" for red)

methods.name: SetBackgroundColor
methods.description: Sets the background/highlight color for selected text.

parameters.name: hexColor
parameters.description: Color in hex format (e.g., "#FFFF00" for yellow)

methods.name: SetFont
methods.description: Sets the font for selected text.

methods.name: AlignLeft
methods.description: Aligns the current paragraph to the left.

methods.name: AlignCenter
methods.description: Centers the current paragraph.

methods.name: AlignRight
methods.description: Aligns the current paragraph to the right.

methods.name: Cut
methods.description: Cuts the selected text to clipboard.

methods.name: Copy
methods.description: Copies the selected text to clipboard.

methods.name: Paste
methods.description: Pastes content from clipboard.

methods.name: SelectAll
methods.description: Selects all text in the editor.

methods.name: Undo
methods.description: Undoes the last action.

methods.name: Redo
methods.description: Redoes the last undone action.

methods.name: Find
methods.description: Finds and selects the first occurrence of text.

methods.name: FindNext
methods.description: Finds and selects the next occurrence of text.

methods.name: Replace
methods.description: Replaces the currently selected text.

methods.name: ReplaceAll
methods.description: Replaces all occurrences of search text.

methods.name: ScrollToEnd
methods.description: Scrolls to the end of the document.

methods.name: ScrollToTop
methods.description: Scrolls to the beginning of the document.

methods.name: SetFocus
methods.description: Sets focus to the editor.

methods.name: About
methods.description: Displays control name and version information.

events.name: ContentChanged
events.description: Fired when the text content changes.

events.name: FileOperationComplete
events.description: Fired when a file operation completes.

events.name: ModifiedStateChanged
events.description: Fired when the modified state changes.

events.name: KeyPressed
events.description: Fired when a key is pressed in the editor.
